resources.string: RunnerGame
RunMap
AI runner
player
your Shady Grove
HQ
You cured your poison at the HQ. Now you feel as spry as a Sequoia!
a Seedy Sapling
Sapling
%s with %d Secrets ready for you
You persuaded the Seedy Sapling to be your informant for %d Vine Cred.
You need at least %d Vine Cred to make this sapling your informant.
You sleuthed %d Secrets from the Sapling.
This Seedy Sapling is stumped for now. Come back later.
an Analyst Aspen with no leads
an Analyst Aspen working on your lead
Aspen
The Analyst Aspen found its first lead to analyze for your %d Vine Cred and %d Secrets.
You need at least %d Vine Cred and %d Secrets to get the Aspen its first lead.
After analyzing your %d Secrets, the Aspen gives you %d Intel.
You need %d Secrets for the Aspen to analyze for Intel.
a Hemlock Haven
Hemlock
A Hemlock begins chasing you! Run away! Quick!
You outran the Hemlock. Whew! Good work.
The Hemlock caught you and poisoned you. Go back to HQ to get better.
Game started.
You got more Vine Cred!
You have discovered %s!

You built a Shady Grove. Double clicking builds or upgrades various sites. This site is the first headquarters for your sappy sleuthing. Over time, you can upgrade it to support your arborous spy agency.
You have %d Vine Cred
You have no Vine Cred
and %d Secrets.
Walk or jog around the neighborhood to get Vine Cred.
We need %d Vine Cred before we can set up our first headquarters.
You have enough Vine Cred for your first headquarters, the Shady Grove. Choose a central location to build your headquarters and double-click your headphones play button to build it.
Now that we\'ve grown our Shady Grove, let\'s go investigate the area.
We can use %d Vine Cred to make a Sapling our informant. Double-click the Sapling to turn it to your side.
Seedy Sapling informants sleuth out Secrets over time. To interact with a site, single-click it.
Analyst Aspens analyze Interesting Intel for your missions. Upgrade one!
You\'ve completed the tutorial, but there is a lot more to discover - get out there and Sap some Secrets!
and
You are approaching %s.
One of your Analyst Aspens lost their lead after %d minutes with no new Secrets.
